exercise: Stab your fingers deep into the rice and then make a fist. Retract. Repeat. This is my hand. I want it strong.
title: Iron Fist

exercise: Stab your fingers deep into the rice and then open your hand wide. Retract, palms away from you. Repeat. Your hand is afraid of the rice. The rice should be afraid of your hand.
title: Screaming Talon

exercise: Embed fists deep in rice. Rotate one direction. Do not worry that you cannot see. Fear is the only darkness. Breathe.
title: Fists of Fury
